title: Set the Equation
text: Let $$n$$ be the first even number, and the second consecutive number will be $$n+2$$. The equation will be $$n\left(n+2\right)=360$$.

title: Solve the Equation
text: Solve $$n\left(n+2\right)=360$$. You foil out the equation as $$n^2+2n=360$$. $$n^2+2n-360=0$$.

title: Apply Quadratic Equation to solve for $$n$$.
Apply Quadratic Equation to solve for $$n$$.
text: Apply Quadratic Equation to solve for $$n$$ when $$n^2+2n-360=0$$. Enter your answer as (a,b) where $$a<b$$.

title: Find Answer Pairs
text: When the first consecutive number is $$-20$$, the second consecutive number is $$-20+2=-18$$.\nWhen the first consecutive number is $$18$$, the second consecutive number is $$18+2=20$$.\nThe final answer is $$(-20,-18),(18,20)$$.
